description: You are given a 0-indexed integer array nums of length n. A split at an index i where 0 <= i <= n - 2 is called valid if the product of the first i + 1 elements and the product of the remaining elements are coprime. Return the smallest index i at which the array can be split validly or -1 if there is no such split. Two values val1 and val2 are coprime if gcd(val1, val2) == 1 where gcd(val1, val2) is the greatest common divisor of val1 and val2.
